main: ^John: Here's the artefact. Now let's go get my daughter.
^Keeper Vigil: So, thanks to you, I have a whole powerful artefacts. You've done everything perfectly.
^Keeper Vigil: Next up is John's ignominious death.
^Keeper Vigil: You just went along with me and gave me everything so I could destroy you. I'm the one who took your daughter, you idiot!
